page.title: 11TRADE.
page.content: We hardly ever go to town because where I live there are quite a lot of shops.If we do go to town it is only to buy furniture or toys.We buy most of our food from the shops along {Walton Road.}There are a lot of food shops but there are also a number of {derelict}shops.These should be knocked down and rebuilt but nobody bothers.We have a variety of shops:D.I.Y. shops, fish and chip shops,newsagents and others.There is one shop on{Walton {Road}where we go to buy our clothes.It sells other things apart from clothes: material,t.v. sets,sewing machines etc.. I enjoy shopping in the area because there are many interesting shops to look at and the people are often very helpful and friendly. We often see the Barra ladies selling fruit and veg. at the top of our street.{(Joanne Windever)
